edge: In the context, Eddie 'The Fireblaster' Plant seemingly loses a Donkey Kong championship game to Sam Brenner. This event is included in a time capsule launched into space, which is later discovered and analyzed by the President of the United States, Will Cooper.

Brenner and Ludlow train Navy SEALs to play the games.
The aliens attack Hyde Park in the form of Centipede.
The aliens send a trophy in the form of the Duck Hunt dog.
